title: Friends Account got stolen
body: My friends account got stolen and i really need help, ive been trying to help him but nothing works

replies.body: Let us help him out from here!  Have him fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we will work with him individually to get it back!
So please if riot sees this i need help
